name: LD48: Buy Low Sell High
description:
Battle in the order book for the highest profit. Controls:

  • Mouse = Aim order
  • Space = Shoot order
  • Land on farthest tile to unlock deeper levels
  • Match Buys and Sells to execute trades

Bug Fix (Apr 28):

  • Fixed win state
  • Fixed turn counter

Thanks for playing! Let me know if the idea is worth developing further?

@buyagames
